overview: Luna Girl uses her Luna Magnet to fill the sky with rainy clouds. Catboy has to learn to get over his fear of water if he wants to save the summer! When Owlette chooses fun over caring for her new feathered friend, Luna Girl is able to convince the upset birdy to help her turn HQ into a giant Luna Magnet. Join Catboy, Owlette and Gekko on 6 exciting night time missions!
title: PJ Masks: Save The Summer
